CLEO.0AA2:
int iTemp
if or
    load_dynamic_library "SilentPatchIII.asi" store_to iTemp
    load_dynamic_library "SilentPatchVC.asi" store_to iTemp
    load_dynamic_library "SilentPatchSA.asi" store_to iTemp
then
    print_help_formatted "SilentPatch is Active"
end
CLEO.0AB0:
while true
    wait 0
    get_area_visible store_to interiorId
    if and
        is_key_pressed Key_F10
        interiorId == Outside
    then
        while is_key_pressed Key_F10
            wait 0
        end
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        repeat 
            wait 0
        until has_model_loaded #HUSTLER
        get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
        get_closest_car_node_with_heading x y z store_to nodeX nodeY nodeZ heading
        clear_area nodeX nodeY nodeZ 3.0 False
        create_car #HUSTLER nodeX nodeY nodeZ store_to Car
        set_car_heading Car heading
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed Car
        mark_model_as_no_longer_needed #HUSTLER
    end
end
CLEO.0AE1:
float x,y,z, radius=15.0
int Char
while true
    wait 2000
    get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
    if get_random_char_in_sphere_no_save_recursive x y z radius findNext True skipDead True store_to handle Char
    then explode_char_head Char
    end
end
CLEO.0AE2:
const LockoutPlayerOnly = 3
float x,y,z, radius=10.0
int Car
while true
    wait 100
    get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
    if get_random_car_in_sphere_no_save_recursive x y z radius findNext True skipWrecked True store_to Car
    then lock_car_doors Car lockStatus LockoutPlayerOnly
    end
end
CLEO.2000:
debug_on // enable trace command
allocate_memory size 260 store_to address 0@

resolve_filepath "root:" store_to 0@ // game root directory
trace "Game installed in %s" 0@

resolve_filepath "root:\data\ped.dat" store_to 0@ // get path to ped.dat
trace 0@

resolve_filepath "userfiles:" store_to 0@ // game saves location
trace "User data location:~w~ %s" 0@

resolve_filepath "." store_to 0@ // this script's source file directory (not affected by 0A99)
trace "This script dir:~w~ %s" 0@

resolve_filepath "cleo:" store_to 0@ // virtual path: CLEO directory
trace "CLEO dir:~w~ %s" 0@

resolve_filepath "modules:" store_to 0@ // virtual path: CLEO modules directory
trace "CLEO modules dir:~w~ %s" 0@

resolve_filepath "" store_to 0@ // relative path
trace "Script's working directory is:~w~ %s" 0@

resolve_filepath "file.txt" store_to 0@ // relative path
trace 0@

set_current_directory 1 // user data

resolve_filepath "" store_to 0@ // relative path
trace "Script's changed working directory is:~w~ %s" 0@

resolve_filepath "file.txt" store_to 0@ // path relative to location set with 0A99
trace 0@

free_memory 0@
CLEO.2001:
debug_on // enable trace command

get_script_filename -1 full_path false store_to 0@v
trace "This script file:~w~ %s" 0@v 
 
allocate_memory size 260 store_to address 0@
get_script_struct_named script_name 'main' store_to address 1@
get_script_filename 1@ full_path true store_to 0@
trace "Ohter script:~w~ %s" 0@
free_memory 0@

CLEO+.0E1D:
const Key_F11=122
while true
    wait 0
    if is_key_just_pressed Key_F11
    then
        if is_on_mission
        then set_on_mission False
        else set_on_mission True
        end
    end
end

while true

    then

        else set_on_mission True
        end
    end
end
CLEO+.0E5F:
const player=0
int char, car
float x,y,z

get_player_char player store_to char
repeat
    print_formatted "Find a car to honk." 1000
    wait 1000
until is_char_in_any_car char

store_car_char_is_in_no_save char store_to car
timera = 0
repeat
    wait 0
    car_horn car
until timera > 5000

wait 10000
set_camera_control true
print_help_formatted "Camera control is ON"

    wait 0
until is_any_fire_button_pressed pad player
print_help_formatted "primary or secondary fire button is pressed"
CLEO+.0E92:
const player = 0
int char
get_player_char player store_to char

while true
    wait 0
    if and
        not is_char_entering_any_car char
    	not is_char_in_any_car char
        is_char_really_in_air char                                                       
    then                                                                                        
        print_formatted "Char is REALLY in air" 2000
        wait 2000  
    end
end
CLEO+.0E93:
const player=0
int char, car
get_player_char player store_to char

while true
    wait 0
    if                                                                          
        is_char_in_any_car char                                    
    then                                                                        
        get_car_char_is_using char store_to car                    
        if                                                                        
            is_car_really_in_air car                                           
        then                                                                      
            print_formatted "Car is REALLY in air" 2000
            wait 2000  
        end                                                                       
    end
end
CLEO+.0E94:
const player=0, CJ_STEAL_TV=2648 
int char, object
float x,y,z

get_player_char player store_to char
get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords char 0.0 2.0 0.0 x y z
create_object_no_save CJ_STEAL_TV at x y z offset false ground false store_to object
set_object_as_stealable object true
print_formatted "Press ~k~~VEHICLE_ENTER_EXIT~ to pick up the TV" time 4000
wait 4000

while true
    wait 0
    if                                                                    
        is_object_really_in_air object                                       
    then                                                                  
        print_formatted "Object is REALLY in air" 2000
        wait 2000  
    end                                                
end

        end
    end
end

bitwise.0B1E:
int 0@, 1@, 2@, 3@
debug_on

0@ = -42
1@ = allocate_memory size 4

// byte
write_memory address 1@ size 1 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 1 vp false
3@ = 2@
0B1E: sign_extend 3@ from_size 1
trace "1 BYTE: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

// 2 bytes
write_memory address 1@ size 2 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 2 vp false
3@ = 2@
sign_extend 3@ from_size 2
trace "2 BYTES: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

// 3 bytes
write_memory address 1@ size 3 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 3 vp false
3@ = 2@
sign_extend 3@ from_size 3
trace "3 BYTES: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

// 4 bytes
write_memory address 1@ size 4 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 4 vp false
3@ = 2@
sign_extend 3@ from_size 4
trace "4 BYTES: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

debug.00C4:
debug_off
breakpoint "testing debug_off opcode" // will be ignored
debug.00CC:
debug_on
breakpoint // pause game
breakpoint false // pause this script
breakpoint "blocking" // pause game with message
breakpoint false "not blocking" // pause script with message
breakpoint "Time is: %d" TIMERA // pause game with formatted message
breakpoint false "Value is: ~g~%d" 0@ // pause script with formatted message
debug.00CD:
debug_on

trace "Hello world!"

wait 1000
trace "Time: %d, ~g~Variable: %d" TIMERA 0@

default.00E1:
const Player=0, Pad1 = 0, DpadUp = 8
while True
    wait 0
    if 
        is_button_pressed Pad1 DpadUp // usually "G"
    then
        add_score Player money 1
    end
end

default.09C0:
const player=0, posOffset=120.0, negOffset=-120.0, NumLock = 144
int Char, Car, Blip
float x,y,z,x2,y2,z2

get_player_char Player store_to Char   
while true
    wait 0
    if 
        is_key_just_pressed NumLock
    then  
        get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords Char posOffset posOffset posOffset store_to x y z
        get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords Char negOffset negOffset negOffset store_to x2 y2 z2    
        get_random_car_of_type_in_angled_area_no_save x2 y2 x y 20.0 #TAXI store_to Car
        if Car <> -1           
        then add_blip_for_car Car store_to Blip
        end
    end
end
